about_the_game:
Farm Book

This Farm themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Inspired by the farmyard setting, this book contains images of lush countryside scenery, animals, and crops!

Contents

The Farm book unlocks the following images:
  • Chicken - 14x14
  • Wheelbarrow - 43x27
  • Horse - 45x39
  • Duckpond - 50x50
  • Scarecrow - 57x76
  • Market - 80x80
  • Crop - 96x96
  • Crop Circle - 100x100
  • Muddy Pig - 106x78
  • Tractor - 108x65
  • Sunflower Pattern - 118x118
  • Horse in Stable - 130x130
  • Sheep - 132x200
  • Berries - 150x150
  • Windmill - 150x150
  • Pen - 187x124
  • Orchard - 200x100
  • Farm Scene - 200x130
  • Hay - 214x146
  • Cow - 300x300

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Farm Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

short_description: Unlocks the Farm themed book for Coloring Pixels. Includes 20 new farmyard themed levels to complete! Expect images of lush countryside, farmyard animals, and crops!
